messages.title: After sixty-five years of Labour and the Conservatives, it’s time to do things differently.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest £2.5 billion in our schools. A guarantee to protect vital NHS services.
No tax on the first £10,000 you earn. Cut Government waste to protect services and pay back the deficit. Action to create jobs.
Give people the power to sack corrupt MPs. Ban big donations from politics and give power back to local communities.

issues.economy: No tax on the first £10,000 you earn. Cut Government waste to protect services and pay back the deficit. Action to create jobs.
issues.governance: Clean up politics. Give people the power to sack corrupt MPs. Ban big donations from politics and give power back to local communities.
issues.health: A guarantee to protect vital NHS services.

quotes.text: Nick Clegg now in contention as potential PM

images.caption: Nick Clegg interacting with individuals in various settings.
